item.description:
This is an Appalachian Mountain Club hike led by an Appalachian Mountain Club Leader.

We will meet at 7:30 in the parking lot of the McDonald's at Exit 5 off Route 3 for carpooling to breakfast and beyond.

Thursday Morning Hike: Blue Hills CC Camp (which means it's open to first timers and newcomers.) Meet at 10:00 AM at the Chickatawbut overlook parking area. Bring water, snacks, suitable footwear and rain jacket. Heavy rain cancels

Difficulty: B3C (means 5-8 miles, moderate pace (1.5-2.0mph) and "average" terrain (on a range from easy/average/strenuous/very strenuous)

On the Blue Hills Reservation map (link), the CCC camp is near Route 28 in the northernmost section of the Blue Hills Reservation.


Pre-registration with the AMC is not required for this activity.  Dogs are not allowed on AMC hikes. Hunting is not allowed in the Blue Hills Reservation.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 7:30 in the parking lot of the McDonald's at Exit 5 off Route 3 for carpooling to breakfast and beyond.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Blue Hills CCC Camp
